articles.title: AU Deals: Criminally Good Prices for The Precinct, Mafia Old Country, Doom Dark Ages, and More!
articles.description: Get your gaming gear primed and wallets at the ready, because today’s lineup of stellar discounts is too good to miss.

articles.title: Op-Ed: May’s Patch Tuesday reveals 77 vulnerabilities
articles.description: Microsoft is addressing 77 vulnerabilities this May 2025 Patch Tuesday, with at least five already being actively exploited in the wild.

articles.title: Patch Tuesday for May: Five zero day vulnerabilities CISOs should focus on
articles.description: Five of the Microsoft 70 vulnerabilities already under attack, and SAP and Zoom flaws are equally critical.

articles.title: Rezvani Knight: Lamborghini Urus turned up to 11 with optional armour kit
articles.description: If you find the Lamborghini Urus appealing, but think it's a bit too much of a wallflower, then Rezvani might have the solution.

articles.title: Coming Soon to Apple Devices: Brain Control Accessibility Features
articles.description: A standard for brain implants that would allow disabled people to control devices such as iPhones and the Apple Vision Pro could be available for developers this year.

articles.title: DJI said Mavic 4 Pro wouldn’t launch in US but these stores are selling it anyhow
articles.description: Apparently DJI isn’t entirely skipping the United States, as its Mavic 4 Pro went on sale at Adorama and possibly B&H.

articles.title: Attend TechCrunch Sessions: AI with this new, limited-time discount
articles.description: We’re excited to announce a big surprise for the AI community — TechCrunch Sessions: AI is getting a limited-time discount to broaden the number of people

articles.title: Google Find My Device rebrands as Find Hub
articles.description: Google Find My Device rebrands as Find Hub to track people, devices, and luggage.

articles.title: Google tests replacing 'I'm Feeling Lucky' with 'AI Mode'
articles.description: Google is testing a redesign of its homepage in which an experimental AI-powered search feature replaces its "I'm Feeling Lucky" button.

articles.title: Apple TV’s wireless audio sync now works with Dolby Atmos
articles.description: The Apple TV 4K’s tvOS 18.5 update adds support for calibrating the synchronization of your speakers while using Dolby Atmos.
